archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library, Virginia State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, Johnston Memorial Library, Virginia State University
did.abstract: Personal correspondence of Inez Worsham of Ettrick, Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Inez Worsham, 1931-24 s.b. , Johnston Memorial Library, Virginia State University, Petersburg, VA.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Inez Worsham was a native of Ettrick and attended Virginia State College. Not much more is known of Miss Worsham other than she entered the field of education.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Several letters are written to Edna Colson who was her major instructor at Virginia State.
